inclusion.criterion: Adult acromegal patient followed in the endocrinology/diabetology service of the CHU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Proven diagnosis of acromegaly or previous acromegaly
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No possibility of written informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Medical or chirurgical conditions interacting with oral health so that the oral evaluation is not reliable
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old man, known case of Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. His lab study shows the IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
